بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
دفع اللّه عنك وأراك العافية
فإن مرضك ممّا قد عمل غمّني
اللّه أتعلّمه يعلمه وقد أردت
متّع اللّه بك أن تدفع إلي
عشرون دينار فإن حاجة
فكّرت عملي وإنّي تعبت بعثت إليك
وأنا مستحق مستحي منك
وأراك اللّه عافية
ودفع عنك
والسّلام عليك
ورحمته
وبركاته

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi

fa ʾinna maraḍa ka mimmā qad ʿamila ġamma ø nī
ăl lāhu ʾataʿallam ʾataʿallamu yaʿlamu hu wa qad ʾaradtu
mattaʿa ăl lāhu bi ka ʾan tadfaʿa ʾilay ya
ʿišrūna dīnār fa ʾinna ḥāǧaẗ:an
fakkarat ʿamal ī wa ʾin nī baʿaṯtu taʿibtu ʾilay ka
wa ʾanā mustaḥiqq:un mustaḥy:in min ka
wa ʾarā ka ăl lāhu ʿāfiyaẗ:an
wa dafaʿa ʿan ka
wa ăs salāmu ʿalay ka
wa raḥmatu hu
wa barakātu hu

In the name of God the merciful and compassionate. In the name of God, the merciful and compassionate.
May God defend you and cause you to see health,
denn Deine Krankheit ist etwas, das mir Kummer bereitet hat - for I have learnt that you are ill (literally: your illness is what God has caused me
and I should like you Gott weiß es! - [...]
- may God give enjoyment through you - to pay me - May God give enjoyment through you! - to pay me
20 dīnārs. For a need twenty dīnārs. For a need
has reminded me of my work (for you). I have toiled for you has reminded me of my work (for you). I have toiled for you, ... ich sende zu Dir (gemeint: "ich wende mich deswegen an Dich"),
and I have a claim on you. obwohl ich mich vor Dir schäme.
May God cause you to see health May God cause you to see health,
and defend you! and defend you.
Best wishes to you,
and his mercy
and blessings! and blessings.
